Class AbstractListController<K,T extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<K> & Serializable & Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
jakarta.faces.model.DataModel<E>
jakarta.faces.model.ListDataModel<T>
org.primefaces.model.LazyDataModel<T>
at.qe.g1t2.ui.controllers.AbstractListController<K,T>
Type Parameters:
K - the type of the primary key of the persistent entities.
T - the type of the persistent entities.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<T>, org.primefaces.model.SelectableDataModel<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractListControllerTest, AccessPointController, DashboardController, SensorDataListController, SensorStationListController, UserListController
@Controller @Scope("view") public abstract class AbstractListController<K,T extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<K> & Serializable & Comparable<T>> extends org.primefaces.model.LazyDataModel<T>
An abstract controller that provides pagination and filtering functionality for a list of persistent entities.
